h1. Create Machine

Configure your virtual machine by choosing your package, server OS and additional SSD storage.

{{html:
    
<div class="form-horizontal">
    <div class="nameField">
        <h2>Name:</h2>
        <input ng-model="machine.name" type="text" class="input-xxlarge"/>
    </div>
    <div class="nameField">
        <h2>Description:</h2>
            <textarea ng-model="machine.description" type="text" class="input-xxlarge" />
    </div>
    <div class="osimage-label nameField clear-both inline-block">
        <h2>OS Image</h2>

    </div>
    <div class="controls controls2">{{include:image_list}}</div>
    <div class="machineWrap">
        <h2>Package *:</h2>
        <div class="machineList inline-block">
            <ul class="controls margin-all-none padding-all-none packages">
                <li ng-repeat="size in sizes | orderBy:sizepredicate">
                    <a href="" ng-model="machine.sizeId" btn-radio="size.id"
                    ng-disabled="!!(size.id*1 < oldMachine.sizeId*1)" class="table-cell package-{[size.id]}" ng-class="{active : $first}" ng-click='activePackage(size.id)'>
                    {[ numeral(size.memory * 1024 * 1024).format('0 b') ]}  Memory, </br>
                    {[ size.vcpus ]} core(s), </br>
                    {[ size.description ]}</a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

}}

{{html:
    
    <div>
        <h2>Increase disk size to:</h2>
        <div class="machineList" >
            <ul class="storage-size-list inline-block margin-all-none padding-all-none">
             <li ng-repeat="diskSize in packageDisks">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector table-cell disk disk-{[diskSize]}" ng-class="{active : $first}" ng-model="machine.disksize" ng-click='activeDisk(diskSize)'>
                  {[diskSize]} GB at SSD speed<br>Included
                </button>
              </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
    

    <div class="form-actions">
        <button class="btn btn-info btn-large mainButton" ng-click="saveNewMachine()" ng-disabled="!isValid()">Create</button>
    </div>
    
}}

{{html: </div>}}
